channel.title: Wii on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Wii on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties - PC and ports consoles
item.description: This project is my own implementation of the 1993 PC version of the game Plumbers Don’t Wear Ties written from scratch.

item.title: 3D Pinball: Space Cadet - Wii and 3DS Ports
item.description: These are two ports of 3D Pinball - Space Cadet for Nintendo Wii and 3DS. It’s originally a game that came bundled with Windows from Windows 95 up to Windows XP.

item.title: Fragile Dreams (Wii)
item.description: Translation made by Traducciones del Tío Víctor in which I collaborated in texts translation, revision and map editing.

item.title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword - Game-Breaking Bug Fix (Wii)
item.description: At a certain point toward the end of the Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword, while collecting pieces of a certain Song, you’re tasked with visiting the Fire, Water and Thunder Dragons in any order you choose.
